name: Mynd Solutions
description: Mynd Integrated Solutions is a leading global service provider in business process and technology management, offering broad spectrum of services in Finance and Accounting (FAO), Human Resource Outsourcing (HRO), Information Technology (IT) and Consulting. Our team of subject matter experts have the right blend of technology and effective business process experience to help you fully realize the benefits of process improvements. Mynd Integrated Solutions provides significant value beyond the technology.
Headline: Propel your business to new heights of efficiency with Mynd
ShortDescription: Business growth fuelled by a combination of human and artificial intelligence

Highlights.name: Next Generation Capabilities
Highlights.description: Enhancing Value through integration of BPM Technology (embedded features like OCR , WFM & DMS etc)

Highlights.name: Scalable Infrastructure
Highlights.description: Global F&A delivery Capability –Knowledge of IFRS, GAAPs , withholding taxes and other country specific local laws.

Highlights.name: Strategic Outsourcing Partner
Highlights.description: Wide range of Finance, HR, IT Solutions & services offered under one roof.

enhanced_description: Mynd Integrated Solutions is a leading global service provider in business process and technology management. They offer a broad spectrum of services, including Finance and Accounting (FAO), Human Resource Outsourcing (HRO), Information Technology (IT), and Consulting. The solution is a web-based, cloud platform driven by automation, leveraging a combination of human and artificial intelligence to propel businesses to new heights of efficiency and foster growth. It provides significant value beyond just technology, with a team of subject matter experts blending technology and effective business process experience to help clients realize the benefits of process improvements.
competitive_advantages: Blend of technology and effective business process experience
Next Generation Capabilities (integration of BPM Technology, OCR, WFM, DMS)
Wide range of Finance, HR, IT solutions & services offered under one roof
Business growth fueled by human and artificial intelligence
roi_benefits: Propel business to new heights of efficiency
